title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.5 - Notification of receipt
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8800.5 - Notification of receipt

State Regulations
(a) Within five days of receipt of a complete petition for an advisory opinion, the
office shall send written notification of such receipt to all
parties. (b) A notification of
receipt shall indicate: (1)
the date on which
the office received the complete petition for an advisory opinion; (2)
the date by which the office will issue
its advisory opinion; (3)
that any
party may submit additional information to the office within 30 days of the
date of the office's receipt of the complete petition, provided such additional
information also is sent, at the same time, to all other parties; and
(4)
that upon the request of any party, and
upon 10 days notice to all other parties, the office may schedule a meeting of
all parties at which they may present their views to the office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8800.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
